desc: Requires the given files/patterns in parallel
Prepends the given path to Erlang code path
Appends the given path to Erlang code path
Start the given app and its dependencies
Switches to be passed down to erlang
Makes and assigns a name to the distributed node
Makes and assigns a short name to the distributed node
Sets a cookie for this distributed node
Starts the Erlang VM detached from console
Does not halt the Erlang VM after execution
